original_title: Yusuf alias Cat Stevens im Bayern 3-LiveClub
overview: Yusuf Islam, formerly Cat Stevens, played an exclusive TV/Radio Show at the Bayern 3-LiveClub, Munich, Germany on April 23, 2009, promoting his new album "Roadsinger". The six track show, plus two encores had its Radio broadcast on April 27, 2009.  The television broadcast was on July 3, 2009.
title: Yusuf alias Cat Stevens im Bayern 3-LiveClub
